article_title: How Two Workaholics Are Taking An (Indefinite) Sabbatical

article_metadata.description: They can remember the day well. The sweltering August heat had subsided and it was unseasonably cool in New York City. A yellow taxi cab dropped Emily and Grant Knapp off at their Park Slope apartment, but they didn't get far before they stopped dead in their tracks. Someone had kicked [...]
article_metadata.author: Lauren Gensler
